rows.label: qst710203_msg0002
rows.name:
Yes, yes! Their liveliness
is no less than that of the
brave knights of Iira!

rows.label: qst710203_msg0003
rows.name:
The people of the capital
should be pleased.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0004
rows.name:
Wadatsumi, from your perspective,
how are the fish here?

rows.label: qst710203_msg0005
rows.name:
Yes, with this liveliness,
I think we can make some
delicious, non-fishy tataki.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0006
rows.name: Ah... so that's how you see it...

rows.label: qst710203_msg0007
rows.name:
Haha, well, in preparation for that,
I'll raise them carefully so they'll
be the best fish I can provide.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0010
rows.name:
Before the Heaven's Holy Grail attacked
the capital, there were many fish
there, and it was very lively.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0011
rows.name:
...I'm asking you, who I've
just met, to do this for me.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0012
rows.name:
This time, could you catch some
fish to release into that moat?

rows.label: qst710203_msg0013
rows.name:
If that moat can be restored to its
former state, I feel like we can truly
bring vitality back to this city.

rows.label: qst710203_msg0014
rows.name: Well then, I'm counting on you again.
